casebody.data:
BROWN
v.
STATE 345P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 6, 2017 Eddricco Brown, for Brown, Eddrico Li'shaun. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, Robert S. Banks, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of November 2017 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of November 2017."
